page.title: 18Employment
page.content: In Brinsley itself there are not many places of employment.A good many people will be redundant or be transferred to other local mines in Underwood very shortly for the pit is being closed down.Brinsleys own pit closed down a few years ago and this sadly is similar to the situation in other parts of Britain today.Many people go out of the area to work :to Eastwood,Nottingham,Derby and other places.There is certainly a problem of unemployment for some people in the area.We have some farms in the area,including arable farming,pigs and cattle.There are few industries. One of note is a local"Craft Shop" which is as near as we come to a tourist industry in the area!There is a small firm that does a lot of fencing,several self employed electricians,plumbers and small shops.
